Author: by rallier
Title: [ANN][ICO] CRYCASH - Decentralized Gaming Ecosystem.
Body: you should follow to medium , twitter etc  CRYCASH Launches an Innovative Rewards Platform with WARFACE Turkey and provides BETA access to all token sale contributors.   https://medium.com/@crycash/crycash-launches-an-innovative-rewards-platform-with-warface-turkey-and-provides-beta-access-to-all-2b4b46283018 Dear community!  We are happy to announce that all token sale contributors will be granted exclusive access to our beta version of the rewards platform. All new gamers who register in Warface Turkey and Crycash rewards platform and complete special tasks set by CRYCASH inside Warface Turkey will receive CRC tokens. This rewards can be used inside CRYCASH ecosystem. Also, gamers can track completion of each task through PLINK app.  During the test period in May, your ability to withdraw CRC tokens will be limited due to ongoing evaluation of the anti-fraud protection system. Our reward platform will become available worldwide in June 2018 after the CRC token is integrated in WARFACE Turkey as one of the payment methods.  All CRYCASH token sale contributors will receive their access link in 24 hours.  http://www.crytek.com/news/all-new-warface-turkey-players-to-receive-crycash-tokens

Author: Apekool
Title: [ANN][ICO] CRYCASH - Decentralized Gaming Ecosystem.
Body: it was 1:1 for USD/CRC I think, with a small bonus I think for some investors.  It's not your usual ICO with massive media coverage for months and several token sales, long road map and nothing to see yet. They just decided on a date for the launch and that's happening at the moment I think. I bought the lowest amount just to check out, they're in my wallet atm. I assume CryTek is going to do what they are used to doing (developing games), and that sooner or later a game is released that is merged with the CRC platform/coin.  The token price will relate to the success of the games and the gamers eventually.  edit: Crycash.io states that token holders will get early access to the Plink application, link here: https://plink.tech/app/

Author: Apekool
Title: [ANN][ICO] CRYCASH - Decentralized Gaming Ecosystem.
Body: Marketplace is online as well it seems.  https://www.cryengine.com/marketplace  And it includes a free beginner pack.  https://www.cryengine.com/marketplace/cryengine-v-beginners-pack  I smell potential for people who are good in that kind of thing and have the spare time to do so. This "freelance" market for game development and design might be what some people have been looking for. It's not easy to get a job as designer/developer/etc without proven experience. Curious how the marketplace will look time, in a month, a year...

Author: Apekool
Title: [ANN][ICO] CRYCASH - Decentralized Gaming Ecosystem.
Body: Hope this becomes the project of 2018.  This is what most games are missing, the cross-link through some sort of universal game currency. Most games with an in-game currency allow some kind of trading (e.g.WoW gold allows you to buy other Blizzard products), but trading across different games would be next level. Effort won't go to waste when changing game. Especially when there's also an option to cash out by selling the token.

Author: Apekool
Title: [ANN][ICO] CRYCASH - Decentralized Gaming Ecosystem.
Body: A very nice aspect of this token is that CryCash is already linked to CryTek (producing games since 1999) and thus the value of the token will most likely hold a tight relation to the success of the games that use the token.  If they manage to create a multiplayer shooter or rpg in which you can collect coins that hold a real value.. seems like a no brainer to me.

Author: Vladdirescu87
Title: [ANN][ICO] CRYCASH - Decentralized Gaming Ecosystem.
Body: Crytek began to pay money to their game players for completing game tasks  Crytek, game developer of Crysis and Far Cry, began to pay money to their game players for completing game tasks.  The gamers can receive the tasks inside Plink messenger, that serves as a wallet for special cryptocurrency CryCash (CRC), that was started on Ethereum-Blockchain in December 2018. The rates of CRC is 1 USD 15 cents. You can earn 1 CRC in the game for 33 kills. You can also buy CRC for Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, Dash and Bitcoin Cash.  Read the details in the article of Coinidol dot com, the world blockchain news outlet: https://coinidol.com/blockchain-based-gaming-platform-crycash-announces-plink-alpha-release/

Author: jlspartz
Title: [ANN][ICO] CRYCASH - Decentralized Gaming Ecosystem.
Body: Just found out about this and decided to check here for ANN thread.  I can't believe this isn't more known.  I've personally used Cryengine before - the best real-time engine in my opinion.  Unreal Engine still remains king because of the gaming industry's personnel being so trained on it, but their engine is the UE killer if they can tip the scales.  They've got the funds and base to make a marketplace to rivel Steam.

Author: CryCash
Title: [ANN][ICO] CRYCASH - Decentralized Gaming Ecosystem.
Body: First of all, thank you for your support! We’ll reveal our hardcap once 70% is reached. Total supply will be equal to the amount of tokens distributed within this token sale + 40% allocated for the team, advisors, legal, business partnerships etc.. It’s important to understand that we’re committed to launching the CRYCASH Ecosystem in any case. Our project already has great traction: one of the major components of our Ecosystem, the Plink app, is nearly ready, and we have support from the gaming giant, Crytek, which will intergrate CRYCASH into its products. This means that we already have enough to start our business operations soon after the token sale.

Author: CryCash
Title: [ANN][ICO] CRYCASH - Decentralized Gaming Ecosystem.
Body: Hello, We’re committed to launching the CRYCASH Ecosystem independently of what amount of funds we raise at the token sale. One of our major products, the Plink app, is almost finished and we’ll provide early access to it for all token sale contributors. We also have the first partnership with Crytek which makes us confident that we’ll succeed.  According to our business plan the CRC token will be listed at all major exchanges and become available at Warface Turkey already in February. Commercial launch of Plink and Advertising platform is scheduled for Q1 2018

Author: Vladdirescu87
Title: [ANN][ICO] CRYCASH - Decentralized Gaming Ecosystem.
Body: CRYCASH Forms Partnership with Video Game Behemoth CRYTEK, Launches Token Sale to Introduce Gamers to Cryptocurrency  Decentralized gaming solutions provider CRYCASH has announced a public crowd sale event to start on December 12th, 2017 until January 15th next year. The independent firm intends to create a democratic ecosystem of custom-tailored products and services for gamers, fuelled exclusively by the CRYCASH token, predicted to introduce cryptocurrency to millions of online gamers and developers.  Having now confirmed its first partnership with video game developer and publisher Crytek, the CRYCASH token project will now benefit from the experience of Crytek’s immensely successful Crysis franchise and the legendary original FarCry.  More: https://coinidol.com/crycash-forms-partnership-with-video-game-behemoth-crytek-launches-token-sale-to-introduce-gamers-to/
